item.description:
Hello,

We are having a special weekend up at the Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club. For new guests interested in full membership, we are offering a reduced rate for lodging. The ridiculously cheap cost of $20/night is being reduced. If you come up on Friday 12/14, and pay for 1 night, you can stay Saturday night for free.

2 nights for the cost of 1 - what an awesome deal.

We plan to ski or board on Saturday 12/15... The weather is looking fantastic right now especially if this weekends snowstorm holds and dumps 15+ inches of snow in the mountains... What a great start to the season! (already members have skied and have said it was pretty good for what was open!).

After a day of skiing, we head back to Wedeln and get ready for our afternoon and evening apres-ski events to the wee hours of the morning! We will also have a catered dinner available in between the events

If you have the energy, get you butt our of bed and ski or ride Sunday! Then we'll head home!
Come on up and join us!
Jonathan
item.name: Wedeln Christmas Weekend 12/14 - 12/16
